      Modifier and Type Method Description
      GameMap MapReader.loadMapFile​(String p_mapFilePath)
      The function `loadMapFile` reads a map file, extracts information about continents, countries, and borders, and returns a `GameMap` object containing this information.
      Methods in com.w10.risk_game.utils with parameters of type GameMap 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      protected static boolean MapValidator.AreContinentsConnected​(GameMap p_gameMap)
      The function checks if all continents in a game map are connected and if the number of continents in the map matches the number of continents in the continentIdToCountryIdsMap.
      void MapDisplay.formatMap​(GameMap p_map, boolean p_showArmies)
      The function prints a formatted table of the map's countries and their information.
      protected static Map<Integer,​Map<Integer,​Country>> MapValidator.GetContinentIdToCountryIdsMap​(GameMap p_gameMap)
      The function `getContinentIdToCountryIdsMap` creates a map that maps continent IDs to maps of country IDs to country objects.
      static List<String> Reinforcements.GroupCountries​(List<Country> p_countries, GameMap p_gameMap)
      This method is to group the countries by continent It creates a String list to hold the countries in each continent.
      protected static boolean MapValidator.HasNonExistentContinent​(GameMap p_gameMap)
      The function checks if there are any countries in the game map that have a non-existent continent.
      protected static boolean MapValidator.HasNonExistentNeighbor​(GameMap p_gameMap)
      The function checks if any country in a game map has a neighbor that does not exist in the map.
      protected static boolean MapValidator.HasSelfReferencingNeighbor​(GameMap p_gameMap)
      The function checks if any country in a game map has a neighbor that references itself.
      static boolean MapValidator.IsMapCorrect​(GameMap p_gameMap)
      The function isMapCorrect checks if a given game map is valid by checking for various conditions such as empty map, non-existent continents or neighbors, self-referencing neighbors, inaccessible countries, and disconnected continents.
      protected static boolean MapValidator.IsMapEmpty​(GameMap p_gameMap)
      The function checks if a game map is empty by verifying if the list of countries or continents is empty.
      static void Reinforcements.ReinforcementPhase​(Player p_player, GameMap p_gameMap)
      This method is to calculate the reinforcement armies for each player.
